question: 祈念
sourceMnemonic:
You <kanji>pray</kanji> with your <kanji>thought</kanji>s, making this a <vocabulary>prayer</vocabulary>. 

This is similar to <ja>祈願</ja>, but can also be used in formal settings to express wishing for somebody's success or good health, among other things.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
